|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE6515KZ, E065100; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072;Q, QCA8072, 0VV, PU64823Y, U064800; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = 400 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE707LDL, E070704; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |nqam3 = 400 |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *"2050500911" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device appears to be marketed as the Deco M9 Plus instead of as M6. :Bluetooth: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/csr8811 CSR8811] (BT 4.2)
*[https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/alexa-compatibility/ ''Alexa Compatibility for TP-Link Wi-Fi products'' on '''TP-LINK''']
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/review-tp-link-deco-m9-plus ''TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus Review'' on '''Digital Citizen'''] *[https://www.mbreviews.com/tp-link-deco-m9-plus-wifi-mesh-system-review/ ''TP-LINK Deco M9 Plus Review'' on '''MB|Reviews'''] (Spec.)
